property.name: check_interval
property.description: How often in seconds the program checks and transmits size of all tracked directories.

property.name: port
property.description: The port the metrics are broadcasted to by the Transmitters

property.name: folders
property.description: List all directories to track. Requires full path names as space seperated values (ex "/home /tmp /usr")

property.name: folder_sizes
property.description: List all folder max sizes in bytes as space seperated values. Must be in same order as folders.

property.name: warning_threshold
property.description: Warning threshold for all folders. You can add a custom property and modify the alert definition if more granular control is desired.

property.name: critical_threshold
property.description: Critical threshold for all folders. You can add a custom property and modify the alert definition if more granular control is desired.
